          <title>
            <string language="fr">Utilisation des rétroviseurs en conduisant</string>
            <string language="en">Use of mirrors in driving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebrauch der Spiegel beim Antreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uso dos espelhos em dirigir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uso degli specchi nell'azionamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήση των καθρεφτών στην οδήγηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uso de espejos en conducir</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ces illustrations montrent l'utilisation du rétroviseur afin que le conduteur puisse voir l'autre voiture.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustrations shows the the use of mirror for the driver to see the other car.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Les voitures</string>
            <string language="en">Cars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigt Abbildungen den Gebrauch des 
Spiegels, damit der Treiber das andere Auto sieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este as ilustrações mostram o o uso do espelho 
para que o excitador v o outro carro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo le illustrazioni mostra l'uso dello 
specchio affinchè il driver vedano l'altro automobile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν τη χρήση του 
καθρέφτη για τον οδηγό για να δουν το άλλο αυτοκίνητο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este las ilustraciones muestran el uso del espejo 
para que el programa piloto considere el otro coche.</string>
          </description>
